video.title: Wildest Africa
video.synopsis: Explore Africa, a land of astounding beauty where the wildest areas are an ode to the most spectacular locations, people and animal species.

episodes.synopsis: Go on a safari to Africa and meet the Big Five: the lion, the elephant, the leopard, the black and white rhinoceros, and the Cape buffalo.
episodes.title: Okavango

episodes.synopsis: Go on a safari to Africa and meet the Big Five: the lion, the elephant, the leopard, the black and white rhinoceros, and the Cape buffalo.
episodes.title: Namibia

episodes.synopsis: Go on a safari to Africa and meet the Big Five: the lion, the elephant, the leopard, the black and white rhinoceros, and the Cape buffalo.
episodes.title: Ngorongoro

episodes.synopsis: Go on a safari to Africa and meet the Big Five: the lion, the elephant, the leopard, the black and white rhinoceros, and the Cape buffalo.
episodes.title: Zambezi

episodes.synopsis: The world's longest river, the Nile stretches from the African Great Lakes to the Sahara Desert, nourishing both wildlife and human civilization.
episodes.title: Nile: An African Odyssey

episodes.synopsis: The dense forest slopes of central Africa's Virunga Mountains are home to an incredible array of monkeys as well as the Batwa pygmies.
episodes.title: Virungas: Land of Ice and Fire

episodes.synopsis: From chameleons to lemurs to giant bugs, Madagascar is home to more than 250,000 species -- most of which are found nowhere else in the world.
episodes.title: Madagascar: Island of Monsters

episodes.synopsis: Mount Kenya's fluctuating temperatures make it one of Earth's most hostile environments, and its melting glaciers could have a far-reaching effect.
episodes.title: Mount Kenya: African Heart of Ice

episodes.synopsis: On Africa's Cape Coast, an array of creatures from penguins to tuna depend on the annual migration of billions of fish, known as the Sardine Run.
episodes.title: Cape Coast: Where Worlds Collide

episodes.synopsis: In the Congo rain forest, we meet antelope-hunting monkeys, western lowland gorillas, and the forest's human inhabitants, the Bayaka pygmies.
episodes.title: Congo: The Untamed Heart

episodes.synopsis: From the world's smallest dog to its largest elephant, animals have found a way to adapt to the Sahara, one of the planet's hottest, driest places.
episodes.title: Sahara: Life on the Edge

episodes.synopsis: Huge, man-eating crocodiles inhabit Lake Turkana in northern Kenya, where temperatures can soar to a searing 120 degrees.
episodes.title: Lake Turkana: Land of the Crocodile

episodes.synopsis: Ethiopia's highland wilderness teems with wildlife, including one of Africa's most isolated primate species, gelada baboons.
episodes.title: Ethiopia: Land of Extremes
